segments.text: I often recalled the days when Tom and I were madly in love .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah . He always tickled my finny bone with his college stories .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You married him for that reason ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Definitely not . The most important thing was we loved each other .
segments.speaker: S1
